alert.note: Alert for Cowley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:31AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Cowley County through 615 AM CDT... At 530 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hardy, or 14 miles west of Cedar Vale. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Arkansas City, Dexter, Geuda Springs, Maple City and Strother Field Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 AM CDT for south central Kansas.
